ComicInfo.Title: And Its Roots Grow Strong Under The Ground
ComicInfo.Summary: Milos, an old Teacher of Harlock, finds the Captain at an old tree from his past. They talk and reminisce about his lost love Maya and his rival Darghund. Darghund and Captain Ferndon are informed by Supreme Commander Muda that they must find Harlock within two days. Also, Muda orders Illumida officer Shadan to have Commander Jigor monitor for the Arcadia and contact Commander Kevele when they have done so. Ferndon hunts down Milos at his home and request Milos to return with him to see Darghund, but he refuses. They're about to start fighting each other when all of the sudden the Arcadia emerges from the ocean and Shadan Orders Jigor to start transmitting its location.
